tool_description: An API showing the latest information regarding dollar exhange rates from major Mexican banks.
title: Mexican Banks Dollar Exchange Rate

api_list.name: Get All Dollar Exchange Rates from major Mexican Banks
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all the Dollar Exchange Rates from some of the major Mexican and non-Mexican banks such as: BBVA, Banorte, Banregio, Banco Azteca, Banamex, Banxico, Santander, Scotiabank.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mexican-banks-dollar-exchange-rate.p.rapidapi.com/api/currency"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mexican-banks-dollar-exchange-rate.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
